   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(openssl_reject_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: %% Common test
   27: -export([all/0,
   28:          groups/0,
   29:          init_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          init_per_testcase/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          end_per_testcase/2
   35:         ]).
   36: 
   37: %% Test cases
   38: -export([erlang_client_bad_openssl_server/0,
   39:          erlang_client_bad_openssl_server/1,
   40:          erlang_server_reject_sslv3/0,
   41:          erlang_server_reject_sslv3/1
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Apply export
   45: -export([server_sent_garbage/1
   46:         ]).
   47: 
   48: 
   49: -define(SLEEP, 1000).
   50: -define(OPENSSL_GARBAGE, "P\n").
   51: 
   52: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   53: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: 
   56: all() ->
   57:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   58:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   59:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   60:      {group, 'tlsv1'}
   61:      ].
   62: 
   63: groups() ->
   64:     [
   65:      {'tlsv1.3', [], all_versions_tests()},
   66:      {'tlsv1.2', [], all_versions_tests()},
   67:      {'tlsv1.1', [], all_versions_tests()},
   68:      {'tlsv1', [], all_versions_tests()}
   69:     ].
   70: 
   71: all_versions_tests() ->
   72:     [
   73:      erlang_client_bad_openssl_server,
   74:      erlang_server_reject_sslv3
   75:     ].
   76: 
   77: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   78:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   79:     ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config).
   80: 
   81: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   82:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   88:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
   89: 
   90: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   91:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
   92:     special_init(TestCase, Config).
   93: 
   94: special_init(erlang_server_reject_sslv2, Config) ->
   95:     case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version(sslv2, Config) of
   96:         true ->
   97:             Config;
   98:         false ->
   99:             {skip, "sslv2 not supported by openssl"}
  100:      end;
  101: special_init(erlang_server_reject_sslv3, Config) ->
  102:     case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version(sslv3, Config) of
  103:         true ->
  104:             Config;
  105:         false ->
  106:             {skip, "sslv3 not supported by openssl"}
  107:      end;
  108: 
  109: special_init(_, Config) ->
  110:      Config.
  111: 
  112: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  113:     Config.
  114: 
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: erlang_client_bad_openssl_server() ->
  119:     [{doc,"Test what happens if openssl server sends garbage to erlang ssl client"}].
  120: erlang_client_bad_openssl_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  122:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  123:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  124: 
  125:     {ClientNode, _, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  126: 
  127:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
  128:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  129:     KeyFile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, ServerOpts),
  130:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  131:     Exe = "openssl",
  132:     Args = ["s_server", "-accept", integer_to_list(Port), ssl_test_lib:version_flag(Version),
  133:             "-cert", CertFile, "-key", KeyFile],
  134:     OpensslPort = ssl_test_lib:portable_open_port(Exe, Args),
  135: 
  136:     ssl_test_lib:wait_for_openssl_server(Port, proplists:get_value(protocol, Config)),
  137: 
  138:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  139:                                          {host, Hostname},
  140:                                          {from, self()},
  141:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, server_sent_garbage, []}},
  142:                                          {options,
  143:                                           [{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  144: 
  145:     %% Send garbage
  146:     true = port_command(OpensslPort, ?OPENSSL_GARBAGE),
  147: 
  148:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  149: 
  150:     Client0 ! server_sent_garbage,
  151: 
  152:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client0, true),
  153: 
  154:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  155: 
  156:     %% Make sure openssl does not hang and leave zombie process
  157:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  158:                                          {host, Hostname},
  159:                                          {from, self()},
  160:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  161:                                          {options,
  162:                                           [{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts]}]),
  163: 
  164:     %% Clean close down!   Server needs to be closed first !!
  165:     ssl_test_lib:close_port(OpensslPort),
  166:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  167:     process_flag(trap_exit, false).
  168: 
  169: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  170: erlang_server_reject_sslv3() ->
  171:     [{doc,"Test that ssl v3 clients are rejected"}].
  172: 
  173: erlang_server_reject_sslv3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  175:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  176: 
  177:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  178: 
  179:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  180:                                               {from, self()},
  181:                                               {options, ServerOpts}]),
  182:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  183: 
  184:     Exe = "openssl",
  185:     Args = ["s_client", "-connect", ssl_test_lib:hostname_format(Hostname) ++
  186:                 ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
  187:             "-ssl3", "-msg"],
  188: 
  189:     OpenSslPort = ssl_test_lib:portable_open_port(Exe, Args),
  190: 
  191:     ?CT_LOG("Ports ~p~n", [[erlang:port_info(P) || P <- erlang:ports()]]),
  192:     ssl_test_lib:consume_port_exit(OpenSslPort),
  193:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, protocol_version),
  194:     process_flag(trap_exit, false).
  195: 
  196: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  197: %% Callback functions ------------------------------------------------
  198: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  199: 
  200: server_sent_garbage(Socket) ->
  201:     receive
  202: 	server_sent_garbage ->
  203: 	    {error, closed} == ssl:send(Socket, "data")
  204:     end.
